titleStmt.title: An Electronic Publication of Staats- und Universitäts Bibliothek Cod. Heb. 95 (Munich)

ab.surplus: שIt appears that the scribe initially began the next chapter immediately after the close of the preceding chapter, then decided to leave a gap of some lines.

ab.note: Expected דמי as an unabbreviated word.

ab.w: מלוה Scribe initally began next halakhah here, then erased and began at the top of the next page.
אחExpect the word פוסק here. Not clear what the word abbreviated here is.

ab.note: Scribe appears to have written an abbreviation mark over aleph that is cancelled. This is uncertain however.

div3.note: Several lines of Talmud Text extend into gap between chapters of Mishnah.

ab.w: וליטול L. 23 and preceding four extend into the right margin.

choice.abbr: לבנ׳ Transcriber suggests that the mark over nun is a deletion mark.

ab.note: Overline marks text to be deleted.
